name: carettab
description: CaretTab: New Tab Clock and Date - A simplistic New Tab page extension with options for displaying time, date, search, favorite links, and more!

scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/css src/scss --source-map true --source-map-embed true
scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/app.js src/js/install_status.js src/js/links.js src/js/load.js src/js/set_default.js src/js/actions.js src/js/functions.js src/js/run.js -c -m --output dist/js/app.min.js --source-map url=inline
scripts.copy: cp src/carettab.htm dist/ && cp -R src/assets/ dist/assets/ && cp -R src/js/vendor dist/js/vendor && cp -R src/_locales dist/_locales && cp src/js/update.js dist/js/update.js
scripts.copy:chrome: npm run copy && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.copy:firefox: npm run copy && cp src/ffmanifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build:chrome: rimraf dist && npm run scss && npm run uglify && npm run copy:chrome && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: rimraf dist && npm run scss && npm run uglify && npm run copy:firefox && npm run zip:firefox
scripts.start: rimraf dist && npm run scss && npm run uglify && npm run copy:chrome && parallelshell "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html"

author: BlueCaret <john@jwh.design>
